title: Ep. 12. Murder on the Rockport Limited - Chapter Three
description: Our heroes board their fateful train to Neverwinter, and are rude to just about every single person aboard. Merle strikes out at evangelism. Magnus learns that he may not, in fact, have the biggest muscles. Taako just wrecks some baby carrots.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
